'''Cheesy Crab Hotpot''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook.

The recipe for Cheesy Crab Hotpot can be obtained from reaching [[Tribe Reputation]] Level 4 with 6 tribes in [[Natlan]].

|Crab = 6
